One of the best multiplayer experiences available on Steam. Dead by Daylight is a survival horror game that you can play with your friends as you and a group of three others work together to escape the grasps of a brutal serial killer. The dark atmosphere, heartbeat sounds, and inclusion of infamous horror movie killers (such as Freddy Krueger, Michael Myers, and Ghost Face) help the game to stand out and get your heart racing whenever you play. You can also play as the killer and hunt down survivors if you're looking for a change of pace.

If you're even on the edge about buying this game, just do it! You won't regret it.
god game!
good game

o que dizer desse game ? no começo da um certo medo, mas depois fica bem tranquilo, você fica querendo mais e mais adrenalina de fugir dos assassinos capirotescos, as vezes da uns bugs aqui e ali, mas nada que atrapalhe dmais sua jogatina, agora com servidores dedicados de matchmaking, você não passa mais raiva com killer lagado.
jogar com os amigos é sempre uma boa pedida, afinal o jogo consiste em full team play.

já jogando de assassino você vai aliviar todo o stress do dia a dia batendo nos outros kkkkkk vlw galeris ! só se divirtam !

This game is pure garbage and completely broken. Devs create new game breaking bugs every time they put out an update. 
But the community makes it all worth it. At its best, you’ll be sharing the strangest interactions with strangers in unspoken moments of truce, and at its worst, you’re accused of hacking and being garbage, but it’s still less toxic than Overwatch. 

10/10 will rubberneck nod Billy again

Amazing 4v1 game! I enjoy it alot its a game where when you first start out its not as fun but it sucks you in where you want to continue playing it.
Im sure anyone would like it if they had all the dlcs to go with it. Playing as a killer however is a bit of a challenge so good luck ;)


Edit. Still the most Broken Game on Steam for a 4V1. Many Bugs And most of the time you get Toxic Killers Or Toxic Survivors That either False Report And you know baiscally just screw you over. 
Still a fun game however stop working on the Map Reworks And Dlc/Outfits and work on the bugs.

Very awesome fun game. Developers constantly add new content and updates and events. I highly recommend this if you want to play with friends and scare them as the killer. Or team up as Survivors and work together to escape. Don't have to purchase the DLCs but the maps and characters you can get are awesome for building your ultimate killers and survivors.
После пары каток в дбд во рту появляется привкус токсичности. А так, палец вверх - игра дарит эмоции, как положительные, так и отрицательные.

Played it on free weekends for a while, finally got a chance to buy it. Game's amazing, and fun to play even without friends. I specially love the fact that you get rewarded for playing instead of only if you win, bloodpoints by playing are most of the time almost enough to go up a level with the character you want to main, and the gen-proc of the skill-tree makes it so you have to play more to get better rather than just picking a skill to guarantee a win.
Totally recomended, specially with friends.
Play catch with your favorite movie killers!
I used to think, "Hey, I would totally survive if I was in a horror movie!" This game has proved me horribly, horribly wrong...

Ich kann dieses Spiel nur empfehlen. Es macht mir super viel Spaß. Die unterschiedlichen Events, die immer wieder stattfinden machen auch fast immer Spaß und sorgen für Abwechslung. Klasse finde ich auch, dass immernoch an dem Spiel weiter entwickelt wird, bspw. kommen fast schon regelmäßig neue Maps, Killer oder Fähigkeiten raus.

Хорошая игра для проведения время с друзьями, атмосфера у игры присутствует, много эмоций от этой игры. Но игра для тех у кого стальные нервы, потому что в этой игре поломаны хитбоксы, много багов и нет баланса между маньяком и сурвом. Решайте сами брать или нет

O jogo é sensacional e faz você sentir uma energia que poucos jogos fazem - uma mistura de tensão, êxtase e bastante risada. A maior parte das críticas que vi é em relação a comunidade, mas isso não chega a se tornar um problema; pra mim parece mais um choro de gente que não consegue ganhar e se frustra com joguinho.
